ojvm.loading
Class ConstantPool

java.lang.Object
  |
  +--ojvm.loading.ConstantPool
public class ConstantPool
extends java.lang.Object

The constant pool ... It is originally created by reading a classFile. The constructor reads the information and then checks that indices point to the right places For example a constant_class_info index should point to an entry that has a name_index which itself points to a UTF8 structure, etc. We must do it in two passes.
